#labels glow,hover
#Glow/Hover effect on flash object/movieclips
= Glow/Hover actionscript - source =

{{{
// Jeg er ikke på om 2 nedenstående klasser er nødvendige
import fl.transitions.*;
import fl.transitions.easing.*; 

var filt:GlowFilter = new GlowFilter;
filt.color = 0xCCCC00;
filt.blurX = 9;
filt.blurY = 9;

dkmap.addEventListener(MouseEvent.MOUSE_OVER, addGlow);
dkmap.addEventListener(MouseEvent.MOUSE_OUT, removeGlow);
dkmap.addEventListener(MouseEvent.CLICK, zoomIn);

function zoomIn(event:MouseEvent):void {
	/*
		skaler element op
	*/
	dkmap.width = 500;
	dkmap.scaleY = dkmap.scaleX;
	/*
		bring element forrest
	*/
	setChildIndex(dkmap, numChildren - 1);
	/*
		centrer element
	*/
	dkmap.x = (dkmap.stage.stageWidth / 2) - (dkmap.width / 2);
	dkmap.y = (dkmap.stage.stageHeight / 2) - (dkmap.height / 2);
}

function addGlow(event:MouseEvent):void {
	dkmap.filters = [filt];
	dkmap.buttonMode = true;
	dkmap.useHandCursor = true;

}

function removeGlow(event:MouseEvent):void {
	dkmap.filters = [];
}
}}}
